> <OLD>
>
> Tucson knew that the insects would attempt to follow him in the air, and with sword in hand, he attempts to use a revolving swing of the blade in their directions, hoping to clip them of their wings.
>
> "Thank you Vestige! I think I can handle it from here."

<NEW>

Vestige barely has the time to nod a greeting before the insectiods
are on him again, but this time, without Tuscon's aid, the batle
between him and they is much more desperate. He fired off several
shots before more of them continued to close in. There were still two
standing, closing on his position as Tuscon continued moving swiftly
through the air, the blue winged insects flying swiftly after.

Tuscon's blade is able to hold them at bay, but only temporarily as
they are far more agile in the air than he is.

Tuscon landed just behind the bed, almost in the position that the
insectoids had been standing originally. The figure still laying prone
and unmoving on it. The figure was almost completely white with hints
of yellow and orange splashed along it. It was as if the figure at one
had far more color, but the color was somehow drained away, leaving it
very drawn and nearly colorless. However its most striking feature was
that it looked almost exactly like Hot Rod!

With an angry buzz the winged insecoids flew at Tuscon, thier stingers
and bladed forelegs slashing at him vigorously. While he is able to
fend off some with his blade, he cannot stop all of them from scoring
on him!

Around them the room continued to rumble.

(TAG)

Preston
